comment: Existence of a coset, like ~ ecexg but with a weaker antecedent: only the restricion of ` R ` by the singleton of ` A ` needs to be a set, not ` R ` itself, see e.g. ~ eccnvepex . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Feb-2023.)
